input.code:
val (_A,_V) = optimizeL2(M, 2, 10, 0.1)
val m1 = opacity(matrix(M))
val m2 = opacity(matrix(dots(_A,_V)) + embeddings(_A,_V))
render(Seq(m1,m2),layout)

val models = for (i <- 0 until 30) yield optimizeL2(M, 2, i, 0.1)
val matrices = for (m <- models) yield  
  opacity(matrix(dots(m._1,m._2)) + embeddings(m._1,m._2))
render(matrices,layout)
